about_the_game:
In this fast-paced and colorful side-scrolling platform shooter, you play as Thomas, who has gone to the garden to mow his lawn. Unfortunately, the lawn is full of holes and piles of dirt, which make it difficult to get the job done. The garden's wildlife also often gets in the way and as if that were’nt enough, many of Thomas’s old friends hang out in the garden and tease him as he drives around. Especially one old friend has grown tired of Thomas, so every time Thomas is out on the tractormower, he flyes drones over the garden and bombs Thomas with water balloons. Fortunately, Thomas has learned to jump over the holes, sitting on the tractormower, and he always has an unlimited number of soda cans with him, which he can throw at the various obstacles.

The gameplay is inspired by the arcade games from the early 80’s and the difficulty level is challenging as in these. Earn points by shooting everything around you and try to do well enough to achive a spot on the highscore list. The game takes place over a year, with one stage per month, grouped into the four seasons. Each season ends with a boss-fight. In autumn, the grass does not grow, but leaves must be swept on the adjacent residential road and in winter the entire area must be cleared of snow. Choose between 3 levels of difficulty: "Easy" for the beginner, "Normal", which is quite difficult - and "Hard", which is only recommended for the most experienced gardeners.

The game fully supports game controllers, except if you achieve a spot on the highscore list. Then you must enter your name using the keyboard. The game can also be played with the keyboard.

highlighted.name: AUTUMN LEAVES OF RED AND GOLD !

detailed_description:
In this fast-paced and colorful side-scrolling platform shooter, you play as Thomas, who has gone to the garden to mow his lawn. Unfortunately, the lawn is full of holes and piles of dirt, which make it difficult to get the job done. The garden's wildlife also often gets in the way and as if that were’nt enough, many of Thomas’s old friends hang out in the garden and tease him as he drives around. Fortunately, Thomas has learned to jump over the holes, sitting on the tractormower, and he always has an unlimited number of soda cans with him, which he can throw at the various obstacles.

The gameplay is inspired by the arcade games from the early 80’s and the difficulty level is challenging as in these. Earn points by shooting everything around you and try to do well enough to achive a spot on the highscore list. In autumn, the grass does not grow, but leaves must be swept on the adjacent residential road and in winter the entire area must be cleared of snow. mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.x or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher, Apple M1 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card will do
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.x or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher, Apple M1 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card will do
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Mow That Lawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card will do
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card will do
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Action-packed sidescrolling gardening-shooter, with colorful comicbook-style graphics and gameplay inspired by the arcade-machines of the early 80's. Mow that lawn, jump over the holes and don't let piles of dirt, animals, drones-with-water-balloons or mischievous friends, get in your way.
